mapper.select: SELECT SUM(W.WARE_QTY) "wareQty" , SUM(W.WARE_PRICE) "warePrice" , W.S_ID "sId" , UPPER(W.ST_PAY_METHOD) "stPayMethod" , S.ST_NAME "stName" FROM WAREHOUSING W, STOCK S WHERE W.ST_NUM = S.ST_NUM AND W.S_ID = #{sId} AND TO_CHAR(W.WARE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND W.WARE_QTY > 0 AND W.WARE_PRICE > 0 GROUP BY W.S_ID, W.ST_PAY_METHOD ,S.ST_NAME

SELECT S_ID , TOTAL , RECEIPT , PAY_METHOD , MILEAGE , TO_CHAR(O_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM ORDERS WHERE TO_CHAR(O_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND S_ID = #{sId} AND UPPER(PAY_METHOD) = 'CASH'
SELECT S_ID , DEFAULT_CASH , OPENTIME FROM STOREOPEN WHERE S_ID = #{sId} AND TO_CHAR(OPENTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT ST_NUM , S_ID , ST_NAME , ST_QTY , ST_AQTY , CA_NUM , ST_STATUS , LACK_QTY FROM STOCK WHERE S_ID = #{sId}

INSERT INTO WAREHOUSING ( WARE_NUM , WARE_DATE , WARE_QTY , WARE_PRICE , ST_NUM , S_ID , ST_PAY_METHOD , ST_LOSS ) SELECT 'WH'||LPAD(WARE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,4,0), A.* FROM(
SELECT SYSDATE ,#{item.wareQty} AS WARE_QTY ,#{item.warePrice} AS WARE_PRICE ,#{item.stName} AS ST_NUM ,#{item.sId} AS S_ID ,#{item.stPayMethod} AS ST_PAY_METHOD ,0 AS ST_LOSS FROM DUAL ) A

INSERT INTO WAREHOUSING ( WARE_NUM , WARE_DATE , WARE_QTY , WARE_PRICE , ST_NUM , S_ID , ST_LOSS ) SELECT 'WH'||LPAD(WARE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,4,0), A.* FROM(
SELECT SYSDATE ,0 AS WARE_QTY ,0 AS WARE_PRICE ,#{item.stNum} AS ST_NUM ,#{item.sId} AS S_ID ,#{item.stLoss} AS ST_LOSS FROM DUAL ) A
